Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Main Street, just south of the Adrilite Museum.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the road you see a shop filled with snakes and spiders. The sign above the door says, "Ennia's Venemous Pets." There is a very ugly spider painted on the window. She really doen't get much business. On the north side of the road is the Adrilite Museum of Natural History, a place of civic pride for citizens of Oceancrest. The entrance is on Marina Way.
